content: चन {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Not, not also, even not (not used by itself, but found used in combination with the pronoun किम् or its derivatives, such as कद्, कथं, क्व, कदा, कुतः to which it imparts an indefinite sense; see under किम्). {%Note%}. Some regard चन to be not a separate word, but a combination of च and न.
